overview: From the past 20 years Malayalis worl-wide have welcomed ‘De Maveli Kombathu’. It was a trendsetter.  Nadirshah has tried to put in two new themes into the programme, one was Maveli’s visit to Kerala during Onam and another was the return of evergreen hero Jayan. Maveli delivering dialogues in actor Innocent’s voice was also in vogue
title: De Maveli Kombathu
